News

10 Nov 2016

The R.E.A.L. House made its first public appearance at Hunan Housing Industrialization and Green Building Industry Expo in Changsha. #Team Solar Offspring

20 Oct 2016

Headed by Prof. Fisch, solar decathletes from Technische Universität Braunschweig interacted with their Chinese partners at Southeast University in Nanjing. #Team SEU-TUBS
